summary: Stephen King  is an American writer from Maine.
full_text:
Lovell is a town in Oxford County, Maine, United States. The population was 1,140 at the 2010 census. Lovell is the site of Kezar Lake, a resort area.
^ 
^ 
^ "Population Estimates". United States Census Bureau. Retrieved 2013-07-06.
title: Lovell, Maine
